duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive business strategies to drive sales and enhance store profitability.
Lead and mentor the sales team, fostering a culture of motivation and commitment to meet sales objectives.
Hire, train, and oversee new staff to ensure a high-performing and knowledgeable sales team.
Enhance customer experience to achieve excellence in service and satisfaction.
Monitor and improve store metrics including average sale, orders, margins, revenue, and spiffs.
Create and implement business strategies to attract new customers and enhance store profitability.
Organize store and company events to engage the community and attract new customers.
Communicate effectively with Regional Manager, Services Manager, and CEO to align store operations with company objectives.
Inspire and foster professional development among employees to build a high-performing team.
Develop positive community relationships and act as a role model to enhance the store's reputation.
Build business-to-business community relationships to drive store sales and partnerships.
Collaborate with Senior Management in important projects and assume additional responsibilities when needed to support the team.
Ensure customer satisfaction through positive interactions and exceptional service.

education_certification.credential: 3 years of experience in a leadership position.
3 years of retail, apparel, and footwear, anatomy & physiology, and business experience.
